det fedt af spille med venner

The casual gamemode is pretty boring if you like competitive games. there are allways people just rushing stupidly just to die instantly or some well traind players just constantly killing you.

Playing ranked isn't fun aswell: we started playing in a 4-player-group (all prime-status). after playing like 4 matches we wern't allowed to continue. The game said we would have a ban-time for like 1 day. After returning to the game  a few days later we played 1 round. Then we weren't allowed to play together because our "skill-gap was too big". (We played more or less equally good, noone was extremly over- or underperforming)
We gave it another try and decided to play our placement matches solo (btw. worst game-play experience ever ;) ). After completing another 2 matches i weren't allowed for ranked again.

My question after that: why and how?

I can't recommend this game and will stay with R6: Siege for competitive matches. Ranked is just frustrating as it doesn't allow you to play. -.-
